title: [BUG][Ticket 4/5] Wire inline positioning template edits to save/update via segment-scoped API

sections.text: Connect the inline editing UI (GOLD-6) to the positioning template CRUD API (GOLD-4) so changes can be persisted per segment. Implement save/cancel behavior with proper dirty-state reset, server-side validation error display, and toast/inline feedback on success/failure. Ensure the UI refreshes from the server response after save and preserves default templates when no custom template exists.
